body_html:
@concretevitamin Actually, that also won't work.
For example, assume 2 mac test runs for 2 different PRs.
If these end up running on the same machine, they can end up with the same paths.
so we need something more like this:

self._logdir = tempfile.mkdtemp(prefix=os.path.join(self.get_temp_dir(), 'tmp_bnlogs/'))

body:
@concretevitamin Actually, that also won't work.
For example, assume 2 mac test runs for 2 different PRs.
If these end up running on the same machine, they can end up with the same paths.
so we need something more like this:

```
self._logdir = tempfile.mkdtemp(prefix=os.path.join(self.get_temp_dir(), 'tmp_bnlogs/'))
```
